thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com | 3 of 12
thread.title: ABN ADA
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by ABN ADA

author: ABN ADA
title: ABN ADA
text:
Aaron Vanecek, at CR Vacations was instrumental in helping me set up my vacation to Costa Rica this past year. I really had no idea what, exactly, I wanted to do, so I gave Aaron some feelers. He took those and came back to me quickly with plenty of options; I was able to choose a great vacation, had a fantastic time, and I plan to use CR Vacations again on my next trip. I would recommend that anyone who is planning a vacation, give Aaron a call, and let him do what he does best!!
Thanks for all you do Aaron!
